text: Josip Manolić (22 March 1920 - 15 April 2024) was a Croatian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Croatia from 24 August 1990 to 17 July 1991. Manolić died on 15 April 2024 in Zagreb, Croatia at the age of 104. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Yugoslavian military people Category:Majors Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:Prime Ministers of Croatia
title: Josip Manolić
